thread.section_title: Intrepid Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intrepid Travel | www.intrepidtravel.com | 2 of 3
thread.title: Jennifer Cooper
thread.title_full: Intrepid Travel reviewed by Jennifer Cooper

author: Jennifer Cooper
title: Jennifer Cooper
text: Staff I have dealt with at the travel agency have been most helpful and understanding. Things did not go to plan last year and the staff were so accommodating with all the cancellations and insurance paperwork. When I booked other trips they were so easy to do- the website is easy to navigate but talking to the travel agents is so much more helpful and friendly.
